“uththamabhiwandana” jathika mahothsawaya janapathi pa්radhanathwayen - shri lanka janadhipathiwarayage nila web adawiya mawubime swadhinathwaya ha nidahasa udesa abhithawa nagi sitimin aithihasika aragalawalata pana pewima waradak se salaka adhirajyawadin wisin deshadrohin lesa nam kala abhitha putha්rayan asu dedeneku saba deshape්ramin lesa yali wirathwayata path kirime nila gasat patha්rayata ada (01) paswaruwe mahanuwara aithihasika magul maduwedi janadhipathi garu maithi්rapala sirisena mathithuma wisin athsan thabiya.deshaye nidahasa ha swairithwaya wenuwen aragala kirima hethuwen adhirajyawadin wisin deshadrohin lesa gasat magin pa්rakashayata pathkala wiruwan ema awaman sahagatha namakaranayen mudalima jathika wagakimakwa pawathiya da wasara desiyakata aasanna kalayak pura ema wagakima itu kirima athapasu wiya.

usas pela ised lakunu nikuth kirimen asahanayata ha kalakirimata path wa athi sisunta sadharana wisandumak laba dennayi tharuna manthriwaru kandayama rajayen ha janadhipathithumagen illa sitina bawa hambanthota disthrik parlimenthu manthri namal rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha me bawa sandahan kale thangalla kaltan niwasedi eeye (23) paswaruwe pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwakata ekwemini.mehidi adahas dak wu namal rajapaksha mahatha mese da kiya.‘’me lakunu prakashayata pathwimath samangama rata thula wishala washayen mathabheda athi wi thibenawa.
